Command.Name: ButtonNew
Command.TooltipDescription: 创建新的测试方案(Ctrl + N)

Command.Name: ButtonOpen
Command.LabelDescription: 打开已存在的测试方案
Command.TooltipDescription: 打开已存在的测试方案(Ctrl + O)

Command.Name: ButtonSave
Command.TooltipDescription: 保存当前测试方案(Ctrl + S)

Command.Name: SaveAs
Command.TooltipDescription: 另存为...

Command.Name: SaveAll
Command.TooltipTitle: 保存所有方案(Ctrl + Shift + S)

Command.Name: Close
Command.TooltipDescription: 关闭当前测试方案.

Command.Name: ButtonExit
Command.TooltipDescription: 退出用例设计(Alt + F4)

Command.Name: NewChildNode
Command.TooltipDescription: 创建新的子节点(Tab)

Command.Name: NewLongNode
Command.TooltipDescription: 创建多行子节点.

Command.Name: NewNodeAbove
Command.TooltipDescription: 上面创建的兄弟节点(Shift + Enter)

Command.Name: NewNodeBelow
Command.TooltipDescription: 创建下面的兄弟节点(Enter)

Command.Name: NewNodeParent
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前节点和它的父节点之间创建一个新节点.

Command.Name: EditText
Command.TooltipDescription: 节点的编辑文本(F2)

Command.Name: EditLong
Command.TooltipDescription: 在多行编辑器中编辑节点的文本(Alt + Enter)

Command.Name: DeleteNode
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除选中节点(Del)

Command.Name: Paste
Command.TooltipDescription: 粘贴(Ctrl + V)

Command.Name: Cut
Command.TooltipDescription: 剪切(Ctrl + X)

Command.Name: Copy
Command.TooltipDescription: 复制(Ctrl + C)

Command.Name: BackColor
Command.TooltipDescription: 让文字看起来像是用高亮笔写的.

Command.Name: ClearFormatting
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除所有格式，如字体和颜色.

Command.Name: RemoveLastIcon
Command.TooltipDescription: 从选定节点删除最近添加的图标

Command.Name: RemoveAllIcons
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除所选节点上的所有图标

Command.Name: LaunchIconsDialog
Command.TooltipDescription: 启动图标对话框选择或自定义图标

Command.Name: SelectAll
Command.TooltipDescription: 选择所有节点

Command.Name: SelectSiblings
Command.TooltipDescription:
选择所选节点的所有兄弟节点.
Note:
- Select all siblings above (Shift + Page Up) - Select all siblings below (Shift + Page Down)

Command.Name: SelectAncestors
Command.TooltipDescription: 选择所选节点的父节点和祖父母节点.

Command.Name: SelectChildren
Command.TooltipDescription: 选择所有的孩子节点.

Command.Name: SelectDescendents
Command.TooltipDescription: 选择所有的后代，即分支节点.

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto1
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 1 (i.e. children)

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto2
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 2

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto3
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 3

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto4
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 4

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto5
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 5

Command.Name: ExpandOnSelect
Command.TooltipDescription: 只有未选中的节点才会被选中.

Command.Name: SelectLevel
Command.TooltipDescription: 从中心选择某个级别的所有节点.

Command.Name: SelectLevel1
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 1 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel2
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 2 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel3
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 3 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel4
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 4 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel5
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 5 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevelCurrent
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前节点的级别上选择节点.

Command.Name: ExpandAll
Command.TooltipDescription: 递归展开所有节点

Command.Name: CollapseAll
Command.TooltipDescription: 递归折叠所有节点

Command.Name: ToggleCurrent
Command.TooltipDescription: 展开/折叠当前节点(Space)

Command.Name: ToggleBranch
Command.TooltipDescription: 递归展开/折叠当前节点

Command.Name: ExpandMapToCurrentLevel
Command.LabelTitle: 将测试方案展开到当前级别
Command.TooltipDescription: 展开/折叠测试方案到当前选定节点的级别

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel1
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 1

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel2
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 2

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel3
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 3

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel4
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 4

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel5
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 5

Command.Name: NavigateToFirstSibling
Command.LabelTitle: 导航到第一个兄弟节点

Command.Name: NavigateToLastSibling
Command.LabelTitle: 导航到最后一个兄弟节点

Command.Name: MoveUp
Command.TooltipDescription: 上移选中节点(Ctrl + Up)

Command.Name: MoveDown
Command.TooltipDescription: 下移选中节点(Ctrl + Down)

Command.Name: SortAlphabetic
Command.LabelDescription: 按字母顺序对孩子节点排序
Command.TooltipDescription: 按字母顺序排序孩子节点.

Command.Name: SortDueDate
Command.LabelDescription: 按到期日期对孩子节点排序
Command.TooltipDescription: 按到期日期对孩子节点排序.

Command.Name: SortNodeCount
Command.LabelDescription: 按节点数对孩子节点排序
Command.TooltipDescription: 按节点数对孩子节点排序.

Command.Name: SortModifiedDate
Command.TooltipDescription: 按修改时间排序.

Command.Name: SortCreateDate
Command.TooltipDescription: 按创建时间排序.

Command.Name: SortOrder
Command.TooltipDescription: 单击切换排序顺序:升序或降序

Command.Name: Undo
Command.TooltipDescription: 撤销(Ctrl + Z)

Command.Name: Redo
Command.TooltipDescription: 重做(Ctrl + Y)

Command.Name: Hyperlink
Command.TooltipTitle: 使用文本字段添加或编辑超链接(Ctrl + K)
Command.TooltipDescription: 网站或本地文件的超链接.

Command.Name: HyperlinkFile
Command.TooltipTitle: 使用文件对话框添加或编辑超链接(Ctrl + Shift + K)
Command.TooltipDescription: 网站或本地文件的超链接.

Command.Name: HyperlinkFolder
Command.TooltipTitle: 使用文件夹对话框添加或编辑超链接
Command.TooltipDescription: 网站或本地文件的超链接.

Command.Name: AddTask
Command.TooltipDescription: 使用日程表面板将任务添加到选定的节点...

Command.Name: AddTaskToday
Command.TooltipDescription: 将任务添加到选定的节点并标注今天

Command.Name: AddTaskTomorrow
Command.TooltipDescription: 将任务添加到选定的节点并标注明天

Command.Name: AddTaskNextWeek
Command.TooltipDescription: 将任务添加到选定的节点并标注下一个周

Command.Name: AddTaskNextMonth
Command.TooltipDescription: 将任务添加到选定的节点并标注下一个月

Command.Name: AddTaskNextQuarter
Command.TooltipDescription: 将任务添加到选定的节点并标注下一个季度

Command.Name: CompleteTask
Command.TooltipDescription: 为选定的节点完成标记任务.

Command.Name: RemoveTask
Command.TooltipDescription: 从选定的节点删除任务.

Command.Name: ClearShapeFormat
Command.TooltipDescription: 清除图形格式和使用默认值.

Command.Name: ViewCalendar
Command.TooltipDescription: 打开的日历窗口，可以从打开的解决方案查看任务.

Command.Name: ViewTaskList
Command.TooltipDescription: 把任务列表放到视图中(只显示下个月的任务).

Command.Name: ViewNote
Command.TooltipDescription: 展示笔记.

Command.Name: Bullets
Command.TooltipDescription: 开始一个项目符号列表.

Command.Name: Numbers
Command.TooltipDescription: 开始一个编号列表.

Command.Name: AlignLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: 左对齐.

Command.Name: AlignRight
Command.TooltipDescription: 右对齐.

Command.Name: AlignCenter
Command.TooltipDescription: 居中对齐.

Command.Name: Justify
Command.TooltipDescription: 对齐文本到左和右边缘，在必要时添加额外的空格.

Command.Name: Indent
Command.Comment: Increase the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: 增加段落的缩进水平.

Command.Name: Outdent
Command.Comment: Decrease the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: 减少段落的缩进水平.

Command.Name: RTLTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: 将选定的文本的方向调整为从右向左.

Command.Name: LTRTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: 将选定的文本的方向调整为从左向右.

Command.Name: NoteHeading1
Command.TooltipDescription: 应用标题1文本样式.

Command.Name: NoteHeading2
Command.TooltipDescription: 应用标题2文本样式.

Command.Name: NoteHeading3
Command.TooltipDescription: 应用标题3文本样式.

Command.Name: NoteNormal
Command.TooltipDescription: 应用标准的文本样式.

Command.Name: NoteInsertTable
Command.TooltipDescription: 在笔记中插入一张表.

Command.Name: NoteEditHtml
Command.TooltipDescription: 编辑Html源代码.

Command.Name: ModifyTableProperties
Command.TooltipDescription: 自定义表属性.

Command.Name: DeleteRow
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除选中行.

Command.Name: DeleteColumn
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除选中列.

Command.Name: DeleteTable
Command.TooltipDescription: 删除表.

Command.Name: InsertRowAbove
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前位置上方插入一行.

Command.Name: InsertRowBelow
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前位置下方插入一行.

Command.Name: InsertColumnLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前位置的左边插入一列.

Command.Name: InsertColumnRight
Command.TooltipDescription: 在当前位置的右边插入一列.

Command.Name: MoveRowUp
Command.TooltipDescription: 将当前行与上面的行交换.

Command.Name: MoveRowDown
Command.TooltipDescription: 将当前行与下面的行交换.

Command.Name: MoveColumnLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: 将选定的列与左边的列交换.

Command.Name: MoveColumnRight
Command.TooltipDescription: 将选定的列与右边的列交换.
